title: What to Look Out for in 2017
description: BBC correspondents predict what's going to happen on the world stage in the coming year.  Joining Owen Bennett Jones to look into the global crystal ball are Lyse Doucet, Jon Sopel, James Robbins and Kevin Connolly.  So what are their predictions for Donald Trump's presidency, elections in France, Putin's ambitions and the various crises in the Middle East?
itunes:subtitle: BBC correspondents predict what's going to happen on the world stage in the coming year.
